title: An Update on the Classification of Rank 2 Weak Fano Threefolds
abstract:
In this paper, an update on the classification of smooth weak Fano threefolds
with Picard number two and small anti-canonical maps is given. Geometric
constructions are provided for previously open numerical cases by blowing up
certain curves on smooth Fano threefolds of Picard number one. This paper
provides updated tables in the Appendix and reduces the 14 remaining E1-E* open
cases to four.
